siteMetadata.title: CDS - Creative Data Science
siteMetadata.description: Welcome to musing about data, code and visualization of complex systems and concepts. Get ready to get to know and love your data,  learn how to connect information with context and discover creative solutions to help guide your data analysis and modeling pursuits.
